item.title: How to get the JSON field types in MySQL
item.description: To get the type of a JSON item in MySQL you need to use the JSON_TYPE function.

item.title: How to get the JSON field types in PostgreSQL®?
item.description: PostgreSQL® offers two types of data types to handle JSON data, JSON and JSONB, you can use the function json_typeof (jsonb_typeof for JSONB) to extract the fields type.
